elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: Revenue from goods
choices: 3. operating income from deliveries and services
4. cost of materials, merchandise, services and energy
6. other operating expenses, depreciation, amortization and impairment losses and financial result
8. non-operating, extraordinary, one-off or off-period expenses and income
